5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 90 * Returns an approximation of the fraction of the input corpus
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 91 * that this index key will reduce the search space to.
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 92 *
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 93 * e.g. selectivity() == 1.0 implies that this index key includes
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 94 * the entire input.
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 95 *
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 96 * selectivity() == 0.1 means that using this index key will
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 97 * only require searching 1/10th of the corpus.
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 98 *
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 99 * This value is computed without any reference to the actual
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 100 * characteristics of any particular corpus, and so is a rough
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 101 * approximation at best.
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 102 */
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 103 double selectivity();

5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 106 * Returns a value approximating the "goodness" of this index key,
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 107 * in arbitrary units. Higher is better. The weight incorporates
5ed6735419ca4df37575f67cbcce8a118235ae71[Wed, 30 Nov 2011 19:12:42 -0500][Nelson Elhage <nelhage@nelhage.com>] 108 * both the selectivity, above, and the cost of using this index
